type: FITS Data type of FITS keyword (string, integer, float, boolean)
sql_dtype: Data type of the Archive Catalog database field which corresponds to the FITS keyword (datetime2, float, int, smallint, tinyint, nchar, nvarchar)
calculation: Algorithm used to determine the FITS keyword, for documentation only
default_value: The default value for the FITS keyword, used by software
units: FITS keyword units (e.g., arcseconds, degrees), for documentation only
sw_source: Used by the code to retrieve values from database or services to fill the FITS keyword (e.g., PPS:miri_lrs_dither.pattern_type)
source: Event field that provides the FITS keyword value in the format prefix@field. For example: tcs.pk.altaz@azimuth
level: Science data level (e.g., 1a, 1b, 2, 2b) where the FITS keyword is first added to the FITS header
si: Science Instrument to which the FITS keyword applies (e.g., FGS, MIRI, NIRCAM, NIRISS, NIRSPEC, Multiple)
section: Science Instrument to which the FITS keyword applies (e.g., FGS, MIRI, NIRCAM, NIRISS, NIRSPEC, Multiple)
fits_hdu: The name of the FITS Header-Data Unit in which the keyword is stored (e.g. Primary, SCI)
destination: List of Archive Catalog tables and fields where FITS keyword value is stored (e.g., [“ScienceCommon.filter”, ”NirissScience.filter”])
